section.title: Limitations
section.para: OpenIDM does not come packaged with a wrapper out of the box to run as a Windows service.
A conditional GET request, with the If-None-Match request header, is not currently supported.
The DELETE action currently does not support ambiguous matches. In a situation with multiple or ambiguous targets, objects are not deleted as expected.
